item.title: Men's Power Rankings: Biggest early-season risers
item.description: Five teams improved their standing by at least seven spots through the first 10 days of the season.

item.title: Women's Power Rankings: The 16 best teams so far
item.description: UConn, USC and 10 more unbeaten squads help make up our list of the top 16 teams in the country.

item.title: 'I can't do it anymore': Tony Elliott contemplated leaving football entirely. Instead, he built a contender
item.description: The Virginia coach reflects on the personal and professional changes in his life three years after the shooting that killed three of his players.

item.title: Week 12 preview: A wide-open ACC title race, key matchups and more
item.description: This week features four ranked matchups that could shift the playoff picture dramatically.

item.title: MLS switching schedule to align with world soccer
item.description: The MLS board of governors voted Thursday to align with the international soccer calendar by shifting the regular season to a summer to spring campaig...
